thread.title: Sekai Lab Launching Its Platform for Global Clients
thread.title_full: Sekai Lab Launching Its Platform for Global Clients

author: admin
title: Sekai Lab Launching Its Platform for Global Clients
text:
Sekai Lab Pte. Ltd. 
TOKYO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Sekai Lab, a global outsourcing platform that connects clients to software developer teams worldwide with its strong focus on South and Southeast Asia, today announced the launch of the global sales division for maintaining global clients from western countries. The new division is located in Tokyo, Singapore and San Francisco to deliver business success to customers’ development projects by assigning Asian constructor teams, also providing the service for localizing their existing products and services into Asian markets. With the new division, Sekai Lab service platform will become available globally, by offering tailored support anytime, anywhere. 
Prior to this announcement, Sekai Lab launched its English website last June. www.sekai-lab.com/en . “'Sekai' means the world in Japanese. With this new division, our platform can now connect clients and development teams from all over the world as it is meant to be.” says Hiroki Inagawa, CEO of Sekai Lab and its parent company Monstar Lab. 
About Sekai Lab 
Sekai Lab Pte. Ltd. is a provider of its service Sekai Lab, a platform which connects clients to worldwide developer teams with its strong focus on Southern and South Eastern Asia in the software development field.Sekai Lab delivers innovative end-to-end solutions to businesses as a single point responsibility for application software, which is designed to enhance customer value.Founded in 2015, Sekai Lab gathers more than 10,000 developers from 100 constructing companies from 15 countries on the platform. 
More information about Sekai Lab can be found at www.sekai-lab.com/en View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929005630/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
